member.name: T:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefNodeIdAttributeDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Node ID for Chrome debugging protocol.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefPluginDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A plugin for CEF and Chromium-derived applications using the Chrome debugging protocol..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefTabIdAttributeDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Tab ID for Chrome debugging protocol.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefWebDocumentDebugDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to (DEBUG) Capability of a Chromium-derived web document..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefWebDocumentDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Web document in an embedded Chromium browser.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.CefWebElementDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Web element in an embedded Chromium browser.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ClearMappingActionDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Clears all known mappings of HWNDs to DOM-tabs.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.DomBlackList
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DOM pageurl regex black-list.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.DomBlackListDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Add a regex e.g. ".*/browser.html" to filter out DOMs. The Regex is checked against the pageurl attribute..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.EnableCefDebugCapability
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enable debug capability.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.EnableCefDebugCapabilityDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This capability provides actions in the element tree that are useful for analyzing issues with object recognition..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ForceHwndRectangle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Force win32 rectangle for dom element.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ForceHwndRectangleDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to In some cases it is not possible to get the correct element rectangle for the dom element. Enable force hwnd rectangle to use the win32 rectangle instead..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ProcessByNameBlackList
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Process name black list.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ProcessByNameBlackListDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Process names added to this list are ignored by the CEF-Plugin..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ResetMappingStrategyActionDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Resets the hWnd to DOM mapping strategy back to default..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.RestartDebuggerClientWithTcpTableSearchActionDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Restarts the debug client using a listening port from TCP table..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.ReverseEndpointsListActionDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Inverts the order of all known endpoints.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.SetScreenshotOnlyMappingStrategyActionDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Sets the hWnd to DOM mapping strategy to use screenshots only.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.TlFailedUpdateDomMapping
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to get or update all DOMs. Make sure that the Chrome debugger port is not being used by another program (e.g. Chrome DevTools)..

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.TlInvalidHostState2A
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to instrument application: Ranorex host encountered an internal error. {0}: {1}.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.WpfFullTypeWhiteList
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WPF window rule FullType white list.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.Localization.WpfFullTypeWhiteListDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Define FullType names of WPF elements which should be valid for WPF window rule replacement.

member.name: P:Ranorex.Plugin.CefWebFlavor.Instance
member.summary: Gets the local instance of this flavor.

member.name: T:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug
member.summary: (DEBUG) Capability of a Chromium-derived web document.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new adapter instance. This constructor is used internally by the Ranorex Core Framework for performance issues!

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.#ctor(Ranorex.Core.Element)
member.summary: Creates a new adapter instance.
member.param: The element to create the adapter for.
member.exception: If is null.
If the element does not support the capabilities required by this adapter.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.ResetCachedTabWindowMapping
member.summary: Clears all known mappings of HWNDs to DOM-tabs
member.exception: Thrown if invoking the action failed.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.ResetTabWindowMappingStrategy
member.summary: Resets the hWnd to DOM mapping strategy back to default.
member.exception: Thrown if invoking the action failed.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.RestartDebuggerClientTcpTableSearch
member.summary: Restarts the debug client using a listening port from TCP table.
member.exception: Thrown if invoking the action failed.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.ReverseKnownEndpoints
member.summary: Inverts the order of all known endpoints
member.exception: Thrown if invoking the action failed.

member.name: M:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.SetTabWindowMappingStrategyToScreenshotOnly
member.summary: Sets the hWnd to DOM mapping strategy to use screenshots only
member.exception: Thrown if invoking the action failed.

member.name: P:Ranorex.CefWebDocumentDebug.RequiredCapabilities
member.summary: Capabilities required by the adapter implementation.
